title: Content design: planning, writing and managing content
description: Planning and managing digital content to meet the needs the public has of government.

child_sections.title: User needs
child_sections.description: How to write and record a user need for GOV.UK.

child_sections.title: Planning content
child_sections.description: Find out how to decide if something is suitable for GOV.UK, what the content lifecycle is and why accessibility must be planned for.
